actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require a speedy trial for criminal defendants charged with use of a firearm in the commission of a Federal crime.

summary.text: Replaces title I of the Speedy Trail Act with provisions setting time limits for making certain pretrial motions in Federal criminal cases and for bringing defendants charged with Federal offenses with the use of a firearm to trial.

titles.title: A bill to require a speedy trial for criminal defendants charged with use of a firearm in the commission of a Federal crime.
